all-sessions.title: Registration & Welcome Breakfast
all-sessions.content: Participant registration, enjoy welcome breakfast, initial networking

all-sessions.title: Opening Remarks
all-sessions.content: GOSIM representative or host opening remarks, agenda introduction

all-sessions.title: Keynote 1: AI-Driven Learning Mechanism Reconstruction: The Leap from Knowledge Learning to Creativity Cultivation
all-sessions.content: Exploring how AI drives the transformation of education from traditional knowledge transfer to creativity cultivation, reshaping learning paradigms

all-sessions.title: Lunch & AIGC Spotlight
all-sessions.content:
Lunch, AIGC Spotlight awards ceremony and showcase

Special Session: 'Technical Products' and 'Artistic Creativity' dual-unit global showcase

all-sessions.title: Keynote 2: The Evolution of AI from Automation Tools to Human Symbiosis
all-sessions.content: Exploring the evolutionary path and future vision of AI from simple automation tools to human-machine symbiotic partners

all-sessions.title: Keynote 3: AI Ethical Paradoxes and Governance Challenges and Practices
all-sessions.content: In-depth exploration of AI ethical dilemmas, governance frameworks, and global practice cases

all-sessions.title: Tea Break
all-sessions.content: Free discussion and networking, enjoy Hangzhou Longjing tea

all-sessions.title: Keynote 4: Developing AI as a Global Digital Public Good
all-sessions.content: Exploring AI as a global digital public good: open sharing models, governance mechanisms, and sustainable development paths

all-sessions.title: Dinner
all-sessions.content: Enjoy dinner at West Lake State Guest House with views of West Lake
